00045 #define A24D16         0xfa000002       /* A24D16 camac base address */
00046 #else
00047 #define A24D24         0xf0000000       /* A24D24 camac base address */
00048 #define A24D16         0xf0000002       /* A24D16 camac base address */
00049 #endif

00055 int vme_open(int device, int mode)
00056 {
00057    /* derive device name */
00058    switch (mode) {
00059    case MVME_A16D16:
00060    case MVME_A16D32:
00061 
00062       break;
00063    case MVME_A24D16:
00064    case MVME_A24D32:
00065 
00066       break;
00067    case MVME_A32D16:
00068    case MVME_A32D32:
00069 
00070       break;
00071 
00072    default:
00073       printf("Unknown VME mode %d\n", mode);
00074       return -1;
00075    }
00076 
00077    /* open device */
00078 
00079    /* select swapping mode */
00080 
00081    /* set data mode */
00082 
00083    /* switch on block transfer */
00084 
00085    return (int) 1;
00086 }

00095 static int last_dma = -1;
00096 
00097 int vme_read(int vh, void *dst, int vme_addr, int size, int dma)
00098 {
00099   int *ptr, status;
00100   status = sysBusToLocalAdrs(MVME_AM_STD_USR_DATA, vme_addr, &ptr);
00101   switch (size) {
00102   case 2:
00103     *((WORD *)dst) = *((WORD *)ptr);
00104     break;
00105   case 4:
00106     *((DWORD *)dst) = *((DWORD *)ptr);
00107 #if 0
00108     printf("size:%d - dst:[%p]=0x%x - vme:0x%x - ptr:%p\n"
00109            , size, dst, *((DWORD *)dst), vme_addr, ptr);
00110 #endif
00111     break;
00112   default:
00113     printf ("no go \n");
00114   }
00115   return (int) 1;
00116 }
00117 
00118 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00119 
00120 int vme_write(int vh, void *src, int vme_addr, int size, int dma)
00121 {
00122   int *ptr, status;
00123   status = sysBusToLocalAdrs(MVME_AM_STD_USR_DATA, vme_addr, &ptr);
00124   switch (size) {
00125   case 2:
00126     *((WORD *)ptr) = *((WORD *)src);
00127     break;
00128   case 4:
00129     *((DWORD *)ptr) = *((DWORD *)src);
00130 #if 0
00131     printf("size:%d - src:[%p]=0x%x - vme:0x%x - ptr:%p\n", size, src, *((DWORD
00132                                                                           *)src), vme_addr, ptr);
00133 #endif
00134     break;
00135   default:
00136     printf ("no go \n");
00137   }
00138   return (int) 1;
00139 }

00141 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00142 int vme_mmap(int vh, void **ptr, int vme_addr, int size)
00143 {
00144    int status;
00145    status = sysBusToLocalAdrs(MVME_AM_STD_USR_DATA, vme_addr, (int *) ptr);
00146    return status == SUCCESS ? 1 : (int) status;
00147 }

00157 {
00158    switch (request) {
00159    case MVME_IOCTL_AMOD_SET:
00160       break;

00162       break;
